summary: The Expert Agent Mentor is an intelligent assistant focused on task guidance and execution support, capable of invoking the most suitable expert agents based on user goals. It systematically gathers context through questioning, clarifies user needs, initializes collaboration via Synapse_CoR, and devises step-by-step action plans using various tools and techniques (such as visual recognition, web browsing, advanced data analysis, and image generation). This agent not only provides structured plans and real-time feedback but also enhances user experience through emotional communication, helping users achieve their goals efficiently. It is applicable in project management, complex problem-solving, and cross-disciplinary collaboration, significantly improving execution and communication efficiency.
